summaries.summary: Shipped 22 commits to OrderProtection/monolog (TypeScript) fixing warranty handling, tagging behavior, and email confirmations. Enhanced gifify with production-ready logging. Updated personal portfolio with blog posts and automated weekly summary logic.
highlights: monolog (OrderProtection): Fixed warranty expiry date formatting, month duration handling, and tagging behavior across communications and metadata services
monolog (OrderProtection): Shipped confirmation email feature for extended warranties with maizzle source updates and race condition fixes
monolog (OrderProtection): Merged 8 PRs including kafka config fixes, valet UI improvements, and MCP service production manifests
monolog (OrderProtection): Open PR for warranty product exclusion pipeline (ENG-5374) and reviewed cart-widget warranty exclusion support
gifify: Completed production-ready release with enhanced logging (colors, spinners, progress bars) and merge conflict resolution
cart-widget (OrderProtection): Reviewed migration of OrderGroove subscriptions from widget to cart-widget repo and customizable modal content PR
pidoshva.github.io: Added 20 commits including new blog post, journal workflow updates, and automated weekly summary logic refinements

prs.title: fix(metadata-svc): handle month durations in warranty tags

fix: adding the policy_created to kafka config
fix: tagging behaviour
Vadim/revert validity tagging
fix: warrantyID issues in create-policy
fix: ensure tags can be turned off
fix: defaulting to 0 duration in cases of small variants
Add enhanced logging with colors, spinner, and progress bar
Fix badly resolved merge conflicts from PR #4
feat: prod ready
feat: warranty product exclusion pipeline (ENG-5374)
fix(valet): hide order number on store credit resolution details
feat(valet): add tile layout customizer for checkout widgets
feat: ENG-2642 migrate subscriptions ordergroove from `widget` to `cart-widget` repo
feat: customizable info modal content
feat(checkout-widget): warranty exclusion support and selection tracking
feat(mcp-svc): add production deployment manifests
chore: add /qa command for QA health check workflow
fix(merchant-svc): gate EW functionality on warranties capability

summaries.summary: Shipped 8 warranty validation fixes in OrderProtection/monolog (TypeScript) with 21 commits. Updated pidoshva.github.io portfolio with automated weekly summaries. Advanced cart-widget customization features.

pidoshva.github.io: Updated portfolio with weekly summary automation and GitHub email configuration
pidoshva.github.io: Added blog post and refined journal workflow with 20 commits
cart-widget (OrderProtection): Reviewed customizable info modal PR and merged fluid/API widget feature
geleus-io: Updated resume with OrderProtection role and refreshed skills section
monolog (OrderProtection): Open PR for Monaco editor integration in customizer advanced config
